snippet: Saverio Costanzo, the Italian director of the New York City-set low-budget drama "Hungry Hearts" that will compete for the top prize at the Venice Film Festival opening this week, sees the exposure his film will get as a godsend....

headline.print_headline: Venice Film Fest, Opening This Week, Is Still a Cinema Lifeline
headline.main: Venice Film Fest, Opening This Week, Is Still a Cinema Lifeline

lead_paragraph: Saverio Costanzo, the Italian director of the New York City-set low-budget drama "Hungry Hearts" that will compete for the top prize at the Venice Film Festival opening this week, sees the exposure his film will get as a godsend.
